alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sherman and northwestern Howard Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 115 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ashton, or 23 miles south of Ord, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ashton around 120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Elba and Cotesfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CDT for central Nebraska.
